sourcesContent:
import { useState, usee } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Order(){ const [singleRoom, setSingleRoom] = useState({}) const {id} = useParams() console.log(singleRoom); useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:9292/bnbs/${id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setSingleRoom(data)) }, []) return( <>

{singleRoom.name}

KES. {singleRoom.price} / 1 night

Entire home for 2 guest

Receipt Summary

249.50 x 2 nights 499.00 USD
Discount 0.00 USD
Subtotal 499.00 USD
Tax 47.41 USD
Total 546.41 USD

Payment Information

) }
